snippet: Many women and girls with mental disabilities face facilities with unsanitary conditions, abuse and medication without consent, Human Rights Watch said.
abstract: Human Rights Watch reports that women and girls with intellectual disabilities or mental illness in India are subject to forced institutionalization, abuse and medication and medical procedures, like electroconvulsive therapy, without consent.
lead_paragraph: Many women and girls with mental disabilities face facilities with unsanitary conditions, abuse and medication without consent, Human Rights Watch said.

headline.main: Group Cites Grim State of India’s Mentally Ill
